mdRecord.dcterms:title: Horse teeth clacker P600078
mdRecord.dcterms:description: We estimate age by examining the lower incisor teeth, as they are easily visible when the mouth is opened. In this specimen, all the incisors are permanent, indicated by their shape, size and the central groove on their labial surface. The wear of the teeth indicates the age of five or above years. Observe the absence of the cups on the central incisors. The cups on the intermediate and corner incisors are present. Based on this information, estimate the age of this specimen.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Horses--Aging
Horses--Age determination
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
